website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling Maybelline mascara that works as promised for most consumers, and delivers many more benefits than frustrations.
pros: Earns praise for creating a fanned-lash look, thanks to the curved brush with thick bristles
Builds volume and provides long wear in most conditions
Dries pretty fast, plus it's easy to take off with cleanser or makeup remover when you are ready to remove it
cons: Although it wears well for most users, hot, humid conditions can hamper its longevity
Can be clumpy when you first put it on, making lashes difficult to separate

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love it! In my photo you can see the difference the mascara makes!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Glides on, extends lashes beautifully. No spider
customer_reviews.text: This amazing mascara was such a good price!! I use Tarte which is a vegan (pricey at $23 a tube) high end natural mascara. I truly believe in chemical free eye make After using this a few times I was in love and this will be my new budget friendly version mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: My beautiful eyelashes are gone!! 😭
customer_reviews.text: I am so skeptical to ever try this brand again - even in stores. I veered away from my typical mascara to try something new and now I have missing and broken off eyelashes. I just want to cry. I should have gone with my gut the first time I applied it. It did not go on smooth and flaked off - even when taking it off with eye makeup remover oil. I will not be buying this product again or makeup on Amazon for that matter. Dumb move on my part.
customer_reviews.author: V B

customer_reviews.title: Lashes stick together, sticky.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff goes on smooth but your lashes clump in to like 4 or 5 clumpy looking lashes; spider lashes. When you blink your top & bottom lashes stick together, this stuff takes forever to dry. Forever. I'm super picky about mascara, my best friend loves it cause she hasn't bought mascara in two years lol (I give her stuff I try once but don't like; she got this too). I actually really like CoverGirl Clump Crusher mascara. It's what I always end up going back to.
customer_reviews.author: texascutie

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy spider lashes - yikes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used several maybelline mascaras and decided to try this one finally. I really don’t understand the hype around this product, I’ve had a terrible experience with it! The bristles on the applicator are super short, which makes it difficult to spread out the individual lashes and evenly distribute the mascara. I ended up with very long but very clumped spider lashes. Even after wiping off the excess amount of mascara from the wand, I still can’t get an even coating on my lashes without them looking whacky.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: favorite mascara ever
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is the best!! I absolutely love eyelashes. I used to wear fakes, but now I am always running late, so there is just no time.... this mascara is the only one I have found that isn't as much as a tank of gas and still makes my lashes look great, the wand separates as you put it on, so you don't have to go back in with a pin and stab yourself multiple times (come on we all have). I really hope they never discontinue this!! AND Amazon is cheaper than the stores that I have seen it at.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Lee

customer_reviews.title: Stays on in the water but also at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.text: I like this Lash Sensation Waterproof mascara. No problems at the pool - I hate that raccoon eye after swimming! It's a little tough to remove at night, but hey, that's why it worked so well at the pool. I find using waterproof mascara works well as an everyday mascara because, by the end of the day, I have smudges under my eyes with non-waterproof styles. It applies very "clumpy" with the applicator, so I'm not fond of that. I'll use up the tube, but probably won't buy it again as an everyday mascara. It requires a mascara removing product, which I just don't want to use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T.

customer_reviews.title: Removal nightmare
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but when I try to remove it, it’s THE most stubborn waterproof mascara I’ve ever owned. I’ve owned dozens. I won’t buy this again and am tossing this. Removal creates too much tugging on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kezza

customer_reviews.title: My New Go-To
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara! It's seriously better than false lashes. I have short, straight lashes that have gotten sparse through the years so I've tried everything to lengthen and curl them. I saw ads for this product and as I like Maybelline mascaras, Volum Express is my go-to, I thought I'd try this one. It lengthens and curls better than the faux lashes I sometimes wear, no joke. I did a side by side comparison and I was amazed. And my eyes are sensitive but I have no irritation from this mascara. It dries super quickly - no smearing, flaking or smudging. Check out the picture. Right eye has the mascara and the left has nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Flava

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive eyes or skin.
customer_reviews.text: This smudged and was stiff on my eyes. It was almost crunchy but when it got the slightest bit wet it just smudged everywhere. It also irritated my eyes so bad that my vision was blurry for around 2-3 hours after wearing. I will not use nor buy this ever again. It also causes my eyelids to be puffy and very red. I have sensitive skin so maybe it was me but i don’t know.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Stutts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mascara, so impressed
customer_reviews.text: I had previously been using the orange covergirl mascara, but it dried up so quickly, so I came across this on Amazon. Let me just say I LOVE this mascara... it keeps your lashes upright without being chunky, and it stays on all day! It doesn't bleed or transfer to other parts of your face, and it stays on even with the first few splashes of water when you wash your face (but it's otherwise easy to remove once you actually rub your eyes).... definitely keeping this as my new go-to! and I love the wand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best brush for applying, but the product itself does not leave any ugly smudges under your eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't leave weird marks under my eyes after a few hours of wearing. Darkens my eyelashes nicely. May need an extra brush or brow tool to help fan out your lashes a bit, I don't care for the brush itself that it comes with, so I apply a bit to my lashes, and then use a secondary tool to shape/even out the product across. Otherwise, the mascara formula actually in the bottle is pretty great, my lashes pop a lot better, and most importantly, it doesn't smudge all over the place even in hot summer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect. I gave the rating a 4 star instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. I gave the rating a 4 star instead of a five, because the application process in my opinion, is where the downfall lies. The application process is a bit off. Doing so by giving a couple of the longer, much closer lashes together a chunky look; however, it does not completely change the overall appearance in a negative way. Also, despite the product being cheap, it does not cause irritation to the eyes. The overall quality is great because even with less being applied, the product still gives your lashes a longer lasting result. In my opinion, even better than some other brands that may claim to be waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Malory Renee Bradley

customer_reviews.title: I love it but...
customer_reviews.text: I love how this mascara goes on and looks, it's the 1st time I've tried it. What I dislike is that it never seems to all come off. I use a quality makeup remover specifically for waterproof makeup but there's always some left behind and I have black smudge under my eyes (after the cotton ball wipes clean). I've gone a few days without eyeliner to make certain the mascara was the culprit and it is. Not sure what to do other than keep looking...
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item thinking it would save me a trip to the store as this is the usual mascara I buy. It came in the mail and I thought I’d give a few tries before reviewing. It definitely is not the same as you would get in the store. It almost seems as a knock off version. It cakes and crumbles and definitely not contact friendly. I’ve had no issues with the same exact one from a store. Dissatisfied to say the least. Won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Flakey and smudgey =/
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mascara hoping it wouldn't flake or smudge. It did BOTH! Not just one, but both! I could have put up with the weird wand and the fact that it dries so fast (which some people might like) that I can't do a second coat (I like it when it's almost dry and grabs the second coat). It was sort of pulling when I tried to put on the second coat. So I decided to just kind of keep putting it on in the first go around rather than switching eyes and coming back to the first eye. Anyway, I could of dealt with that. But not flakes and smudges later in the day. Nope.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wirth

customer_reviews.title: I really liked that I was able to wear this to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that I was able to wear this to the beach and not worry about ending up with raccoon eyes! My only reason I took off a star is because of the following: a. It did require me to put on quite a few layers to get the desired look that I wanted. b. it was difficult to take off, even using a product designed to take off waterproof makeup. Overall this was what I was looking for and it will be very useful during the hot weather!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fox

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara I've ever used in 50yrs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought based on reviews. Wow am I glad I tried it! So natural looking! It does not clump or crumble. It cleans easily without 'scrubbing'. What value for the money. But this is the best mascara I've ever used! No matter what I paid...this performs flawlessly. Takes an application or 2 because it's so smooth...you'll not use it like usually floppy mascara is. 50yrs of mascara use and now I found this! Yea!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Baker

customer_reviews.title: If you like the falsies and don't want to pay the 40$ ...
customer_reviews.text: If you like the falsies and don't want to pay the 40$ for Dior mascara, then this is your new staple. I love the mascara. Just a few flicks of the wrist and it looks great. Comes off in pieces a bit in the shower, but comes off easily with eye make up remover. Does not smudge during the day. I do find it darker than expected when coming out. It shows up easily, so it's not the go-to mascara for no make up day, (unless you can magically do it lighter than I do), but it looks great when paired with minimal eye make up so it's still a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Sometime back I received 2nd degree burns to my arm in a freak accident. I didn't realize my eyelashes were scorched off from the heat until I went to put on fake lashes and the beautician asked if I had been around some kind of heat because my lashes were practically gone. lol Since then my lashes haven't grown back as they were. This mascara makes my lashes look full, long and thick. I love the small bristles that help my really thin and fine lashes get noticed. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Starr

customer_reviews.title: Don't even bother looking into other mascara, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Holy cow, my lashes look INCREDIBLE with this on. Almost like I'd gotten lash extensions. I prefer the product ordered online versus bought in stores. The formula seemed smoother, didn't clump as much, and hasn't dried out like usual. I'll be ordering online from now on, probably won't ever use another mascara again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelci Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Works great. No smears!
customer_reviews.text: I already have somewhat full lashes so my biggest concern with any mascara is how well it stays put through the day. Not only did this make my lashes look beautiful w no clumping, it stayed put through a hot Texas day. Even after wearing it through the night, there was very little smear when I woke up. This one has passed all my tests! I will be ordering this regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Britttx3

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lashes but Raccoon Eyes Sneak In
customer_reviews.text: I love that this mascara made my eyelashes look long, curled and thick! It goes on very easy. The issue I had with it is that while it looked spectacular in the morning, by noon I had raccoon eyes that got bigger throughout the rest of the day. I have dry eyes and tend to be sensitive to light and blink more often than most, but I refuse to wear mascara that leaves remnants. Don't be disappointed, even Clinique at 3-4 times the price leaves me with raccoon eyes. Going back to Almay, which stays on my lashes and not on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: SuzAnne

customer_reviews.title: Used once and never again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on good reviews. I tried once and I never used it again. 1. Wand - very sharp edges you need to be very very careful when applying mascara. Shape is also not the best applicator. 2. Mascara - was very dry felt flaky when you apply on lashes. 3. Taking off - was the worst! I washed my face 2x used make up remover using cotton pads 2x very gently but it was still stuck on my lashes and the worse part made my lashes so brittle that it fall off. This is definitely not a good buy for me I would not recommend to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Miss_Anne_Love

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this for $5
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I’ve been using it since it first came out. Love the wand with the different length bristles and curve. Easy to control volume with multiple coats and to get every lash coated. You can use this for everyday lashes or use 3 coats to get crazy volume and drama. I use a lash comb after 2 coats with any mascara. I use this in my top and bottom lashes and find it resistant to AZ summer heat and reasonable amounts of water. I have dry skin, not oily so this may be a factor in wear.
customer_reviews.author: Countess Anastasia Beaverhausen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MASCARA!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a new mascara for a while and wanted it to have a good EWG score. This has a EWG score of 2 which is really good (fewer harsh/unfriendly chemicals). It makes my lashes longer and more fanned out than any other mascara before. It was very easy to apply and didn’t smudge or clump. New favorite and will definitely keep buying. Best mascara I’ve tried yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to remove
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this mascara 5 stars just based on the look it gives my lashes but I have to knock out 2 because of how difficult it is to remove, and it isn’t even waterproof! It flakes off in big chunks which then smear, stain your skin and won’t come off without scrubbing. Plus it smudges too easily. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: CJO

customer_reviews.title: New formula  or old stock?
customer_reviews.text: This was my go to mascara for over one year. The last few tubes I've purchased are not the same. Either there's a formula change or this is old stock that needs to be thrown out. It clumps after a few hours. Is thick and hard on my lashes and just feels cakey and dry. It's almost impossible to remove. I use makeup removal wipes. It burns my eyes terribly. I will no longer be using this mascara faithfully. I'll be looking for something better from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Full lashes, hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: Makes my lashes super full! I love how thick and pretty my lashes look when using this. I like the wand although it sometimes clumps at the tip so be careful, it can leave an unsightly blob on your eyelashes. When removing I have to take a couple of passes with eye makeup remover on a cotton round and it is a bit difficult to get it all off. Little dry bits cling to the areas around your eyes so it does take some effort to remove ALL the mascara. That being said, still a great product and a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy, flaky, racoon eyes with first use :(
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked about the good reviews. Maybe I got a faulty product but it clumped heavily when I applied it lightly after wiping excess off in the tube. It flaked immediately. And within a couple hours of hanging around the house (maybe rubbing my eyes?) I had racoon eyes. When I tried to request a replacement there was no way to do so. My only option was to make a phone call with a message that said it would be a long call. I'm disappointed and wish I had an avenue to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good!  Price and performance!
customer_reviews.text: I had a "lash lift" (best money I ever spent at a spa) before Christmas and was told to ditch my waterproof mascaras, because the removers would make the "perm" not last as long. I haven't used non waterproof in decades, so just had to roll the dice. This one is terrific! Very thickening, lengthening and fanning. I did finally learn that if I do more than one coat, to do it very soon. If I wait too long, it will get clumpy and I have to comb lashes. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Zillabreeze

customer_reviews.title: Bold, dark lashes at a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat of a makeup snob. I usually only wear Too Faced “Better than Sex” but have decided that it is just too expensive to replace every 3 months. I decided to give this mascara a try and I am SO glad I did. I don’t even pick up the TF mascara anymore because this one builds my lashes up so better! It does not look clunky, but instead makes my lashes bold and long. Super happy with this purchase. NOT waterproof so wear accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Defective!!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this Mascara!! I was practically waiting by the door for it all day, and to my surprise, when I opened it, the comb/end applicator was completely missing!!! I'm soo mad! I spent almost $8 for this item and it's not returnable! I've been shopping on Amazon for years and have never had a defective item. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jess M

customer_reviews.title: Mascara close to expiring
customer_reviews.text: The mascara itself is ok. My biggest gripe is that my mascara was close to expiration when shipped to me. I typically replace every 3 months but this one ended up drying out and becoming clumpy after a month. I was hoping to be able to buy this through Amazon and take advantage of my prime. But I went back to shopping at Ulta for this mascara
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra B

customer_reviews.title: I like this product very much⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I actually decided to try this mascara for the wand! It looked like it could give a better application due to the way it has a fan look on one side and comb lOok on the other side of it. Well it was nice too see that it works just like I thought it would. I like it. I dried fast and it took me a couple times using it to where I didn't cause clumping on my lashes. The color is black Brown and I chose waterproof because I end up touching my eyes throughout the day. Baby oil and baby wipes remove it easily.
customer_reviews.author: T.Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara that is removable with water
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a little more inexpensive mascara that is removable with water, so I tried this and it works great. I love the fact that I don't need extra mascara remover. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I always have to use a Q-Tip along the bottom lash to remove mascara that has smudged. However, I am 65 years old ... and that may be part of the reason it smudges a little. I would recommend this if you are looking for a "removable with water" mascara.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy as H***!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a bad batch, but holey moley I've NEVER had mascara so prone to clumping in my life! (And I'm including those young teenage years where you pretend you're Madonna and layer it up!) This is hands down the worst mascara I've ever used. I wish there were a way to sue for the aggravation and wasted time this tube has caused me! Stay. Away!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Warning, this item isn't eligible for return
customer_reviews.text: This item isn't eligible for return. Be sure you want this because you can’t return it for any reason. I’ve tried. This product sucks, the brush really is a crap brush as everyone says. The bristles are teeny tiny all around, one side is even worse than the other. I don’t have the time to figure how to make it not go on thin everyday. I want long and thick lashes. Talk about a frustrating product. I can’t believe they’re actually trying to sell this in stores. It’s a dud product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Really Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not review products. I had read so many positive reviews I thought what the heck. I hate this mascara. It is really heavy and thick. It globs on and sticks your lashes together. This is just my opinion. Going back to my old mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl

customer_reviews.title: Made my eyes itch and hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: This mascara made my eyes itch like crazy and was difficult to remove. When I applied it, it was pretty clumpy. It had a sticky/waxy texture that was hard to remove. Every time I tried it my eyes, my eyelids, lash line would be extremely itchy.
customer_reviews.author: mommabear

customer_reviews.title: As good as the expensive stuff and better than many of them!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mascara! I have tried many of the high priced mascaras and this one is just as good and better than many! It goes on wonderfully. Never clumps on me. The brush is great! It curls my lashes nicely and gets color right down to the lash line. It wears well all day without flaking or smudging. At this price I don’t bother wasting my time on the pricy stuff any more just to have a fancy tube in my makeup bag. What’s the point?
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY L NORRBOM

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't quite live up to the hype it's been getting. Sure, the brush is cool looking, but it does about the same for volume as most other volume boosting mascaras. It's a bit more frustrating because there's a certain way you need to hold the brush for full effect and it clumps lashes together perhaps a bit more due to the style of the brush. I'd get the same bang for my buck with a cheaper, old fashioned mascara. Yep, it's good and waterproof but not as easily removed with my normal eye makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Baumbach

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this mascara because of the way it cakes on. I'm not sure if it's the applicator or the product---maybe both. I was scraping product off of the applicator, wiping it down with tissue, trying to smooth it out/wipe some off of my lashes. To me it's just not user friendly at all. I was so aggravated with it after the second use, I trashed it. Maybelline makes such good mascaras, but this isn't one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay mascara for the price point. I was hoping to find a new favorite, but this isn't it. While I do like that it is removed pretty easily, I found it a bit clumpy, and I don't believe it lasted all day the way some of the other mascaras I've tried have done. I guess it's true that you get what you pay for. It's a good product for the money, but there are better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Caroleena5

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. I even prefer this to other high end options. The brush on it is perfect. This formula makes my lashes look so long and helps them hold a curl. The waterproof formula helps it stay on all day, even through sweat or swimming. I recommend this mascara all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara I have found and I have tried a lot of different ones. I am 62 and have diminished lashes but this stuff does the trick and makes my lashes look better than their best. I get the waterproof variety because my eyes water a lot and the regular kind is a mess. I use Merle Norman Very Gentle Eye Makeup Remover at night to get it off easily without rubbing my eyes. I go through it pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lashes!
customer_reviews.text: Lash sensation indeed! This is an amazing non clumping mascara that adds length. I’ve always used the classic pink and green Maybaline mascara in the past. This will be my new go-to.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth Murphy

customer_reviews.title: It last so much time
customer_reviews.text: Left side Maybelline lash waterproof, right side it's Hot cat max volume waterproof, for sure Maybelline it's my favorite, it gave me volume and not only that, it Last so much time, literally I slept one night with the mascara, I was so tired that I forgot remove it and it was almost the same as the day before! Love it, the hot cat it was the worse, my eyelashes immediately start falling out and zero volume
customer_reviews.author: Ana Woods

customer_reviews.title: NOT Washable!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying this mascara. I used it one day and couldn't wash it off. I normally don't have to use a make up remover when I wash my face but this mascara wouldn't wash off. The next morning after my shower, it was still clumpy on my lashes. So disappointed.....No return policy either. I should have purchased this product at Ulta first.
customer_reviews.author: J. Teti

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at First, But Then...
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this mascara. I like the brush, and I like how it goes on. The problem, for me, was that my eyelashes started breaking off. I had very long, full eyelashes, but after a few months of using this, my lashes were so short. I never thought it was the mascara until I started using a different one. After a few weeks, my lashes were back. I don't know if this was unique to me, but just beware.
customer_reviews.author: Robenrox

customer_reviews.title: No Smudges
customer_reviews.text: I've tried soooo many brands of mascara. Waterproof and regular. This is the first one I have found in a long time that doesn't leave smudges under my eyes by the end of the day. It does clump a little bit upon application but all mascara does this to me so I am used to combing my eyelashes out a little after applying. Also, this as pigmented as expensive mascara and lengthens in just one coat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: seriously so good
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara I have used so far. It makes your lashes look so long that I have been asked if I was wearing fake eyelashes while I had this mascara on. It is not clumpy and removes with just a genital face wash and water so you don't loose any eyelashes when taking it off. I also really like the wand shape and you get a lot of product in the bottle. Very worth the good price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T.

customer_reviews.title: clumpy and flakey and not brownish at all
customer_reviews.text: 1. brownish black is more like bluish black 2. very thick formula, goes on very clumpy, impossible to work with 3. flakes off throughout day 4. wouldn't say it is fully water proof
customer_reviews.author: Danielle wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Wow...so impressed and the best price!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can NOT believe how much I love this mascara. It separates and lengthens like none I've tried before. I didn't expect much for the price of $5 and change. Other lower priced mascaras have made my lashes fall out and the stuff always flakes. This is almost...conditioning! Comes off easily with remover and never ever flakes! I love it. I'm done spending $15 and up on mascara..this is my new go to!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara and no one can tell me otherwise!! I have tried different brands but always come back to this one. It isn't waterproof but I can't stand those, they end up pulling out my lashes when I try to get them off. This comes off easily with micellar water but doesn't smudge during the day. The wand is awesome and always makes my lashes look full but separated.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very very bold mascara... I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the expensive name brand mascaras but I decided to give this a try and I'm glad it did. This stuff is very bold just as it is advertised. This is my new mascara for sure. I don't need to apply much to get bold lashes. The type of wand is a unique design that allows you to get all of your lower lashes easily. I haven't had any clumping issues with this mascara. The mascara mostly comes off easily, but sometimes it can leave a mess that micellar water or a makeup removing wipe can fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mascara a while back and I really like the brush its curved and fits nicely on my lashes this way I can brush them, and they seem to be coated well with this product. I like how they make my lashes look. I also like how this mascara stays on all day and it doesn't run. I usually remove with coconut oil and warm water. I'll be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: It isn’t false advertising
customer_reviews.text: If you anticipate what you will be crying A LOT, this is the perfect mascara for you. This stuff is super waterproof. Wear it to your wedding. Wear it swimming. Wear it to break up with someone. You’ll be able to turn on the waterworks for sure. This wouldn’t come off no matter what I did and it took about two days to fully remove, even with waterproof makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't get it to go on without clumps
customer_reviews.text: I just can't seem to get this on without clumps. It may be my poor technique. After I put it on I have to separate my lashes with a toothpick or something similar. I have good lashes that may also add to my difficulty. I tried to get it right for two weeks. Once I get it on and declump it, it seems to do a good job, by the end of the day I have kind of shreds under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Baybrio

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara so much it's my only choice from here on. I tested this mascara to see if it held up over time. It clearly is better. No flaking at all, makes your lashes look much longer, and it looked very good the next morning. (I tested it!) The price is very good too, so you can purchase two, or another Maybelline product!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, short, baby lashes. This mascara makes it look like I have false eyelashes on. Usually mascara that works this well will flake a lot into my eyes, but this one doesn't. Also, after an intense workout (boxing classes and training for a half marathon), my mascara is still on point. The only con - it can be hard to remove. I use wipes at night, and if I "forget" to take it off, it's pretty clumpy in the morning and hard to clean. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love buying makeup, I hate dropping tons of money on it. I read a lot of great reviews about this mascara and decided to give it a go. I like it for the most part. It's dark and adds some volume to my lashes, but it clumps quite a bit. You really have to be careful when applying it or you're going to have clumpy eyelashes all day. However, for the price, it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Grinnell

customer_reviews.title: It’s decent but not exceptional
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time trying this mascara, and I don’t feel any more enthusiastic now. On the plus side it removes easily and doesn’t smudge. Unfortunately it clumps and doesn’t apply smoothly, and the curved brush makes painting lower lashes time-consuming. With the reasonable price in mind, I would consider it a better than average choice, but just barely.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gates

customer_reviews.title: Best out there - I’ve tried it all!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried the expensive mascaras on the internet that claim to make your eyelashes a foot long....I’ve tried Tarte, and Clinique, and Bare Minerals, and other brands on QVC. There’s one online in a green, glass tube that was really expensive and I forget the name...sent that feathery dust crap back. This is hands down THE BEST out there. I come back every, single, time. It fans and separates my lashes perfectly, doesn’t clump. Doesn’t flake. And very buildable. The waterproof is not as good
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Zapp

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is now my absolute favorite go to mascara to use. The length and volume I get with it, is wonderful. I have fine lashes & I highly recommend. It doesn't clump my lashes at all. Gives the perfect volume and really lengthens my lashes. I'm on my 2nd purchase of it and I plan on continuing to purchase this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Two strokes and your done! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: To the people reviewing this product and saying it clumps—you are using too much! All it takes is two strokes and your done. No clumping wonderful black lash. If you keep going over it, it will clump. But if you do clean strokes on your eyelashes it is just as good as all the other $50 ones I’ve spent my money on. Worth it. Try it, use it sparingly, and you’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Oya

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara by far
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara I have used so far, & I've tried MANY! I do already have long lashes but this product glides on super smooth, but not too thin to where you have to apply over & over & over for the volume. It takes the less time with the best results out of all the different ones I've tried. And the brush is amazing! I don't know why I started trying other mascaras but no more. This stuff is where it's at!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: Originally, starting out I loved the brush and the formula. It went on easy, and so what if it flaked like crazy at the end of the day? But after just a couple of weeks, it had turned into a clumpy mess. The design of the brush is such that whenever you pull it out there's going to be a LOT of mascara on it, which is fine when the formula is fresh and super thin. But when it thickens a little with time it becomes thick globs all over the mascara wand that made my eyelashes look way too spidery. Won't buying again.
customer_reviews.author: ixnay

customer_reviews.title: This Mascara Really is Sensational!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased #253 Blackest Black Maybelline Lash Sensational Washable Mascara. In fact, I just ordered another to keep in my travel bag. I've had no issues with clumping. I have eyelashes that appear invisible until I put on mascara. This mascara is great. You can actually see I have eyelashes and they even look longer. Despite some of the negative comments some people have left, my experience has been very good. I just hope Maybelline don't discontinue this. I've found my new favorite mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Little Frog

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I normally pay like $45 for mascaras and I’m so surprised because this was so cheap and it’s really good!! The brush is nice, allows me to go light or add more and go full, my forever go too!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: I have used quite a few mascaras in my time and I have to say that this is one of the BEST ones I've tried so far. It makes my lashes so long, my friends always asks me if I'm wearing false lashes. I also like the fact that it's easy to remove from my lashes. I'll keep using this until I find something better, but for now this is it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wade

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: eh, its ok. Better off going with regular waterproof, this stuff smudges and raccoons on us only skinned girls. For Maybelline I would stick with good old Great Lash waterproof in the pink and neon green tube. But my mew fave is by Essence, Lash Princess false lash effect waterproof. Cheap right here on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Karilyne

customer_reviews.title: Open / used mascara!!
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe Amazon shipping me an open/ used mascara!!! This is so hygienically wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I dislike how sparse the bristles are on the brush, it makes the mascara very clumpy on my lashes and messy on my eyes while applying. Though it lengthens them a fair amount & looks good when I can hold my eyes open long enough for it to dry before blinking. I wanted so badly to love this mascara, but its only an average one at best for me. :(
customer_reviews.author: Shay L

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy when I chose this one based on other positive ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear contact lenses, some mascaras cause irritation. I was so happy when I chose this one based on other positive reviews. I noticed right away that it made my sparse lashes look very thick and luxurious (awesomely happy about this). Beyond that, If I gave a second coat, I had lashes that most celebrities would envy. Like the name of the product, it truly is SENSATIONAL. Not one bit of irritation from this product, it doesn't flake off in the middle of the day, therefore making it a great match for those wearing contact lenses. I will be using this as my new "go to" mascara. Oh, and one more thing... check out the price, it's sooo affordable. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Equestrienne Diva

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of my favorite good priced mascara I've found in a long time! Makes my lashes so long and fans them out nicely. It doesn't run it smudge throughout the day. The brush is easy to use and doesn't clump or clock up the wand. More than likely I'll be buying more instead of kinds I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Brit8977

customer_reviews.title: My fav drugstore mascara
customer_reviews.text: Simply put: this is an excellent volumizing, waterproof mascara. I can't honestly say that it's a dupe for some of the higher end volume-enhancing mascaras I have tried (Lancome, Benefit, YSL, etc.), but as someone with an office job who doesn't wear my night-time/going out looks to work (or wear high-end makeup every day-- I just can't justify the cost of doing that!), this mascara is actually perfect for daily wear. For the price, you really can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: LadyA87

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for an amazing mascara... Keep looking... :(
customer_reviews.text: Believe the other reviews here that describe this as gunky, messy, and impossible to remove. It's like putting black glue on your eyelashes. I have been looking for a fabulous mascara for quite a while, and this one has great reviews, and photos... but they're definitely fake, from influencers. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Long Tall Sally

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara I have ever used!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best mascara I have ever used. That being said, I’ve only used it a few times so I can’t say how long the tube lasts and how the formula does over time but upon initial application, it is my new favorite even of all high end mascaras (and I have tried a lot of high end mascaras). This goes on quick and separates and builds length for days with a little volume but not too much. It’s amazing. Like, I can’t believe how good it is. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: caitlin sollee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: One of the best drugstore mascaras I've ever used. I tend to get a different mascara every time mine runs out because I'm never fully satisfied, but I might just stick with this one. It can clump your eyelashes together a little bit, but with a lash comb it's fine. Holds my lashes' curl really well throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great volume great price
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it has huge volume and lifts to the sky. I did two coats and got this result. Honestly I haven’t used maybelline since high school, it made my lashes way shorter and they’ve never been the same. So I’m hoping the formula was changed by then. It’s been 10 years so fingers crossed I don’t have the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Recently made the switch and love this mascara! It really makes my lashes long and voluminous without looking clumpy and spidery. The wand separates the individual lashes giving them a fuller, longer appearance. One application does the trick! It's easy to remove with makeup wipes and feels like it all comes off pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: It works, but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. It definitely gets under my eyes after a few hours, but is there a mascara that doesn’t? I wish it came off easier—it sort of goes gel-like when it dries, and doesn’t dissolve in soapy water. So I have to pull it off my lashes in little bunches, and I can never get it all.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Flakes and smudges
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is excellent for making my lashes look long and lush, but it doesn't come off with my facial cleanser, so it stays on and it flakes and smudges so that I have black stuff under my eyes. I had better luck with Cover Girl waterproof mascara, and I'm going back to that.
customer_reviews.author: Listening Woman

customer_reviews.title: Great runner up!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to mascara - cheap alternative to my Better than Sex. I normally wear Better than Sex but if I’m not leaving my house or going to the grocery store, why waste it. This works great. Better than Sex is my go to and work mascara but this is my quarantine runner up!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rae

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful thick lashes!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is probably the best I've ever owned! My lashes look so big and defined. It gives so much volume! It is hard to remove even with makeup remover. Also when you put the wand back inside the tube if you arent careful the mascara will get pushed out onto the outer rim.
customer_reviews.author: Staciii

customer_reviews.title: The best for volume and easy to use wand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought over six different mascaras in the last 6 months I don't like any of them this one by far is always been my go-to one, shame on me for trying others I should have stayed with the best. So I ordered three I love the volume they give me and the brush is easy to use it's the best mascara I've ever used and I've used a lot of mascaras.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. Trust me.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was SO MUCH BETTER than I had expected. At the price point, I wasn't expecting much. I have extremely sensitive eyes, and rarely wear mascara. However, that may change. This goes on silky smooth, and gets lashes I didn't even know I had! Also, very waterproof and smudge proof! It completely smokes the other two mascaras I had that were 2-3 time the price. I'm thrilled. I only wish they had it in a lighter brown. (I'm a dark blonde and prefer lighter mascara for a natural look.)
customer_reviews.author: kiaroxy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Smears
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. I used snd within a few hours I had raccoon eyes. I did not even touch my eyes or go outside. I tried for 2 days and each time with in a few hours and there was black under my lower lashes and upper eye . The product was also a bit clumpy on the brush
customer_reviews.author: llc

customer_reviews.title: Lashes falling out
customer_reviews.text: This stuff caused lashes to break and fallout.. I’m very disappointed with the product and will never purchase again. Not worth it :-(
customer_reviews.author: B2017

customer_reviews.title: Not for Sensitive Eyes
customer_reviews.text: This mascara gave me the WORSE swollen & itchy eyes ever! Wanted to love this mascara, but it ended up being a waste of money because I had a horrible allergic reaction to it. **Update - Re-purchased to give it a 2nd chance and the mascara arrive broken!!! Ughhh guess this wasn’t meant to be ***
customer_reviews.author: dian.her.

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara to keep in the makeup bag
customer_reviews.text: I like mascaras that are easy to remove so I don’t tug on & accidentally rip my lashes off. This one washes off easily but it’s still long-lasting. Even though I live in a hot climate, this doesn’t melt off. I especially like the brush on the wand & how it gets every lash adding volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R

customer_reviews.title: My fav drugstore mascara
customer_reviews.text: As far as drugstore mascara is concerned... this is my pick every single time! I use two coats every time and that's all I need. It may be waterproof while wearing it but unlike others, it's easy to wash off at night. (Excuse my lazy makeup and crazy eyebrows in the pic. Lol lazy day)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised this mascara is well rated. I really don’t like it at all. It has very little effect on my lashes and isn’t very buildable. The brush also makes no sense with tiny bristles on the curve where you’d apply to your lashes and the longest bristles on the outside of the brush. I bought another mascara just days after trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Grove

customer_reviews.title: My New Forever Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this Mascara. I was a mascara hater until I found this. I always thought other mascaras made my eyelashes look worse, not better. I hated the way it always clumped your eyelashes together. NOT MAYBELLINE!!! I will love this stuff forever. It makes my natural assets pop! No clumping, no running, just long beautiful lashes all day long. There is no need for fake lashes with Maybelline Lash Sensational.
customer_reviews.author: cbr600grl

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge THRIVE cosmetics fan. Especially their mascara. After watching a makeup tutorial this gal used this brand of mascara so thought I would try it out. For me, it didn’t do any lash extension and it was super difficult to get off. So Thrive is still the best mascara I’ve found that does everything I want.
customer_reviews.author: Monroe

customer_reviews.title: I won't use any other mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I've been swimming, pools and ocean, I've been running and sweating, I've been crying, and this mascara DOES NOT BUDGE. I have small eyelashes to begin with and this gives me extreme volume, whether it's brand new or nearing the end of its life. Sure, it can be a pain sometimes to take it off, but if you want waterproof power, be prepared to take some time out of your day taking it off properly. I recommend the Neutrogena Night Calming wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Emily McKeon

customer_reviews.title: FULLLLLL LASHES
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. It's my first week using it and it's great. You can build it to make your lashes look longer/fuller or can use one to two coats to go for a more natural look. They are tear-proof, and have little to no smudging. I greatly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My go-to Mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this mascara for many years now. I’ve tried so many others but they just never seemed to work for me. Only issue I have with this mascara is that it starts to get clumpy after a few weeks. I then would have to order more. I typically order 2 a month of this specific brand. Until I find another product that works better for me, this is the only trusted application I will use!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Christina

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, throw away all your used mascara and replace it with this. It's washable, doesn't clump, the wand separates your lashes and the color is perfect. It's my absolute new favorite. Water resistant mascara pulls out your eyelashes, therefore you should be using this product instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

product_meta.title: Maybelline Lash Sensational Washable Mascara, Blackest Black, 0.32 fl. Oz
product_meta.description:
Size:Pack of 1| Color:WASHABLE BLACKEST BLACKGet a sensational full-fan effect with Maybelline New York’s fan favorite Lash Sensational Washable Mascara! Lashes grow in more than one layer. This volumizing mascara can unfold layer upon layer of lashes thanks to its exclusive brush with ten layers of bristle. Maybelline’s best lengthening mascara lengthens and volumizes lashes from root to tip. The buildable liquid ink waterproof formula coats from all sides without clumping. The fresh liquid formula is ophthalmologist tested and safe for contact lens wearers. Complete your eye makeup look with another Maybelline’s fan favorite Master Precise Liquid Eyeliner and your favorite City Mini Eyeshadow Palette.

BRAND STORY
By Maybelline
feature_bullets: Lash sensational, for a full fan effect: Exclusive fanning mascara brush with ten layers of bristles reveals layers of lashes for a sensational full-fan effect. Add the look of length and volume without clumping. Opthamologist tested, contact lens safe

Define your eye with mascara: No eye look is complete without Maybelline Mascara--amp up the drama with The Falsies Mascara, keep it classic with the iconic Maybelline Great Lash, or go for a smooth, clump-free natural-but-better look with Snapscara

Maybelline is the eye expert: Whatever your signature eye look, whether natural or dramatic, Maybelline helps create looks that draw eyes. With a broad selection of pencil & liquid eyeliners, highly pigmented eyeshadows, iconic mascara, & eyebrow makeup

Maybelline has what you need to create any look--foundation, bb creams, concealers & highlighters to create a perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms
Remove maybelline makeup with micellar water: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, and as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
